org.openremote.entities.controller

Class Device

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openremote.entities.controller.Device

  • public class Device
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents a device which has a name, list of commands it supports and list of sensors it has available.
    Author:
    Richard Turner
